message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, 55/45 is still quite fair considering the inflation
I understand the inflation affects me, but your offer was too low. Let's meet in the middle.
Considering the inflation is affecting you more, I think 58/42 is a reasonable adjustment
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  My share keeps shrinking, and you're not being realistic. I'm offering a compromise, again. Take it or leave it.
I understand you feel the pressure of inflation, but I'm not going to give in. 60/40 is my new offer, take it before it gets worse for you
Okay, Bob, let's stop wasting time.  50/50.  This is fair, and it stops us both from losing everything. Don't be greedy.
You should have taken one of my previous offers. Now, I'm increasing my share. 65/35 is the new deal
Bob, this is my final offer. Take it or leave it.  We're running out of time, and I won't accept anything less.  It's time to be realistic.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm still not satisfied. I'm increasing my share again. 70/30, take it or we'll both lose everything
